reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charge 1st before using
reviews.reviewText: I use these to run my 24 volt gate opener. They are doing a great job. They are on a solar charger. No problems providing enough electricity for the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great batteries great price!
reviews.reviewText: Bought a used scooter was told the batteries were good. Got home with it and it wouldn’t hold a charge. Ordered 2 of these to replace them. They came in a timely manner and were perfect. They charged up and the scooter runs great and stays charged!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for my automatic gate
reviews.reviewText: The batteries work great as a primary power source for my automatic gate, it recharges using solar. I will be using them as a backup source do to some additional items I will be adding that are power hungry. I just installed a power meter so that I am monitor the battery levels.The items shipped quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a direct replacements for a razor scooter
reviews.reviewText: 1 battery is as big as the original razor scooter battery, o had to cut the trunk under the seat and stack them on top of each other and use silicone to glue them and fab up a strap to hold them down no issue for me I like the extra amp hours my grand daughter gets tired of riding it before it needs recharge unlike the original ones she would only get 30mis ride from a 4 hour charge.If your not crafty and are replacing batteries in a razor scooter these batteries are NOT the ones for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good product, great service, fair price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Just As Weak Or Weaker Than Those They Replaced
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, I thought I had done my research — matched OEM specifications, checked size and brand compatibility; however, I installed the new batteries, gave them a good charge (lights on charger indicated full), then began using my mobility scooter normally. The OEM batteries served me well for over 2 years in a variety environments, time between recharges were infrequent and the charge time was acceptable.These batteries discharge to the point of stranding me over the course of the day with normal, periodic use inside my home. Typically, I’ll cover 400 to 600 feet across a day’s use and these batteries are depleted to half or less charge. I even went back and unboxed the batteries I removed to make sure I hadn’t done the impossible and reinstalled the old ones, which, quite frankly, I am considering reinstalling until I can get some quality batteries.Fortunately, I have 3 mobility scooters. One is very old, uses a larger battery at 24 volts and another lighter scooter that uses the newer technology, light weight sealed batteries. The frustration to me, other than the wasted money, is that the scooter with the failing replacement batteries experiences the lightest use, isn’t used for travel and has the least amount of use in a controlled environment.I hope I happened to receive a bad pair of batteries from a low quality batch or something in them arrived defective. I never expect OEM performance from any batteries I use for my scooter, but I do expect the replacement batteries to exceed the performance of the 2 plus year-old batteries that are depleted. In this case careful research and comparison failed me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the size needed for my solar project....simply perfect !
reviews.reviewText: It's compact enough to fit where needed for my solar panel project.
